purpose: To highlight the increase in M&A activity in China over the past 3 years, with a focus on outbound activity.
title: M&A activity in China heated up in the past 3 years – in particular, outbound activity

bullets.text: Chinese M&A volume increased during 2015, and reached its highest level in the last 6 years; 2016 saw lower activity
Outbound M&A continued to grow even stronger in 2016 to 7 times inbound activity
ChemChina’s announcement to acquire Syngenta for ~$43bn was the largest Chinese outbound deal of 2016
